alert.note: Alert for Caddo; Canadian; Cleveland; Grady; McClain; Oklahoma (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 23 at 1:02PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms winds will impact portions of northern Grady, east central Caddo, western Oklahoma, northwestern Cleveland, Canadian and northwestern McClain Counties through 130 PM CDT... At 100 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorm winds from near Cedar Lake to Minco to Piedmont. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 40 to 45 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Western Oklahoma City, northwestern Edmond, El Reno, Chickasha, Newcastle, Yukon, Bethany, Mustang, Warr Acres, The Village, Tuttle, Piedmont, Nichols Hills, Union City, Minco, Calumet, Amber, Bridge Creek, Pocasset, and Tabler. This includes the following highways... Interstate 40 between mile markers 110 and 147. Interstate 44 between mile markers 79 and 105, near mile marker 117, and between mile markers 119 and 124. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Caddo; Canadian; Cleveland; Grady; McClain; Oklahoma
